name: Blow Dry
description: Shelley operates a small salon with her partner. When the British Hairdressing Championships are announced, Shelley asks her ex-husband and son to join her.

name: Bridesmaids
description: Annie, a jobless chef, is asked by her best friend, Lillian, to be her maid of honour. Issues evolve when she ruins the wedding events in a rage due to her conflicts with one of the bridesmaids.

name: The Wedding Singer
description: Robbie, a wedding singer, meets Julia, a waitress, at a reception and the two hit it off.He soon learns that she is engaged to another man, who treats her like garbage, and must stop their wedding.

name: The Bounty Hunter
description: Milo must retrieve his bail-jumping ex-wife, Nicole. The job gets tougher than he anticipated when Nicole escapes while chasing a lead and they both end up on the run for their lives.

name: Miss You Already
description: A woman undergoes treatment to battle breast cancer while her best friend (Drew Barrymore) tries to get pregnant

name: Fifty Shades of Grey
description: Fifty Shades is a British-American film trilogy series that consists of three erotic romantic drama films, based on the Fifty Shades trilogy by English author E. L. James.

name: Escape Plan II
description: A security expert named Ray Breslin uses his skills to test out the reliability of maximum security prisons.

name: London Has Fallen
description: Mike, a Secret Service agent, must find a way to escape with his team when Barkawi, a terrorist, attacks all the world leaders attending the funeral of the British Prime Minister, James Wilson.

name: Mile 22
description: James Silva, an American intelligence officer, must ensure that an informant in possession of sensitive information can escape the country safely.

name: The DoorMan
description: A former soldier must save her niece and nephew from armed thieves planning to steal priceless art from a building in New York City.

name: Takers
description: A group of successful bank robbers plan their biggest heist ever. Now, they must face a Los Angeles detective who will do anything to see them behind bars.

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.
